pages.text: A unique creature composed of spinning superheated rods and open flame, found most commonly in Nether Fortresses. $(br2)1. Superheated Rods $(br)Main body is composed of several rods that rapidly spin around the core of the blaze.

2. Flight $(br)An unknown mechanism or biological process allows the blaze to levitate above the ground. $(br2)3. Fireballs $(br)The blaze is capable of firing a volley of fireballs at a target up to 48 meters away, causing extreme incendiary damange to its target. $(br2)Assessment: Rods essential for advanced crafting
